articles.description: The top seed Alcaraz, who is aiming for his third Grand Slam title, has been handed a tricky draw at the 2023 US Open | Tennis News
articles.content: Carlos Alcaraz heads to the final Grand Slam of the year, aiming to accomplish a challenge he has never faced before, but is certain to face many a times in his career ahead. When the Spaniard will b… [+2221 chars]

articles.title: Indian kabaddi teams for Asian Games: Pawan likely to captain, Pardeep left out - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The men's and women's teams were announced on Friday via a letter issued by the Sports Ministry
articles.content: The Indian men's kabaddi team for the 2023 Asian Games will be almost the same as the one that won the Asian Kabaddi Championships in June, barring one change: Akash Shinde coming in for Mohit Goyat.… [+2569 chars]
